title: Zanab247
author: Zanab247
content: Now that I know how important crypto is to the life of humanity despite the condemned governments and many bankers has condemned the decentralized currency just to gain more population from the world, but the truth has show up for people to know that crypto is not a scam but an asset that will add income to you when you have the idea and invest on it. I believe many newbies are ready to learn crypto to improve despite the sacrifice you need to pay by reading books that contain crypto and more active in this forum to learn so many things from Bitcointalk forum. Why newbies are more afraid of bear market than senior crypto users? Is it because they don't know that bull market will come up later? I asked this question because whenever there is a long bear in the market, I always have that feeling of making a wrong choice to invested such amount of money on crypto at the moment but when the bull take over the market I celebrate myself for making it. Can you impact us how to eliminate this spirit of fear in crypto investment by sharing your idea or experience because, I'm ready to learn crypto so that I will be bold in any season I will come across in the future.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: I'm emphasising on the point "while newbie been afraid of bitcoin whereas senior members are not afraid of bitcoin, number one reason is that the senior colleagues has been acclimatised with the rate or conditions of bitcoin whenever it's experiencing rising and falling, so therefore, we don't need say that bitcoin newbie is afraid of bearish season they only scared of losing their funs or capitals for the investment, in which it's obvious that many people have already experienced the rising and falling of bitcoin before they got to the Sr member rank, so they are no longer been afraid of bitcoin.

comments.author: Fauderz
comments.body: Actually, it's quite simple in my opinion, because new people, especially those who are still learning crypto, will definitely experience more panic because they have never experienced it before, unlike those who have been in crypto for a long time.Experience is important and we will only be able to know what to do after we have experienced so in this case it is very natural for many beginners to feel panic even though they have learned because in this case when even the theory is out of the head it is impossible for us not to panic in the realization that is done especially for the first time feeling bearish.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: You can only be afraid if you don't know the kind of investment plan you are going into, bitcoin investment is not a quick get rich scheme or a ponzi scheme you could just invest and expect to make serious profit over a night. My only advice is that, you need to choose either Short term or long term with this you can be able to detect how much you can hold your bitcoin or not, naturally altcoin investment are always advisable to be short time if those coin are not reputable coin maybe a newly launched coin be subjected into short term since you don't know much about the project you are investing. You can always enjoy bitcoin while you hold for long term by then you could be that tension free, again before venturing into market always utilize the bear market and wait for the bull to strike only if you are interested on short investment.

comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on September 18, 2023, 07:22:21 PMNow that I know how important crypto is to the life of humanity despite the condemned governments and many bankers has condemned the decentralized currency just to gain more population from the world,The government and banks are just fighting for their own personal interests, and they make everything look like bitcoin is bad and can only be used for bad things, and people who don’t really know anything about bitcoin will easily believe them. And they make fiat currency look like it’s not used for any illegal activity just because they know they can control fiat currency, but they don’t have power over bitcoin. Quote from: Zanab247 on September 18, 2023, 07:22:21 PMWhy newbies are more afraid of bear market than senior crypto users? Is it because they don't know that bull market will come up later? When beginners are afraid of bear markets, I don’t blame them since they are new to the crypto space, so I think it’s normal. Even beginners who have the mindset of holding for a long time will be scared if they witness a bear market because they don't know how it will end. But people who have witnessed bear markets before do not have to panic, they already know that after a bear market, there will be a bull run, and they have witnessed both bear and bull market before.Quote from: Zanab247 on September 18, 2023, 07:22:21 PMCan you impact us how to eliminate this spirit of fear in crypto investment by sharing your idea or experience because, I'm ready to learn crypto so that I will be bold in any season I will come across in the future.No matter how you try to eliminate the spirit of fear in newbies, you are just wasting time because when there is a bear market, people are still going to panic, they might not sell, but some might be regretting why they invested early, they should have been holding a stable coin so that they will invest when the price is already down.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on September 18, 2023, 07:22:21 PMWhy newbies are more afraid of bear market than senior crypto users? Is it because they don't know that bull market will come up later?I quickly checked your account it seems I found you were here 3 years ago which I think is enough time to gain knowledge and not be afraid of investing in crypto.  The main reason could be, that newbies to crypto may not have experienced multiple market cycles and they might not be aware of the historical pattern of crypto markets, where bull markets are often followed by bear markets and vice versa.  Senior users have likely been through these cycles and understand that bear markets are temporary.QuoteI'm ready to learn crypto so that I will be bold in any season I will come across in the future.Good to know!Community engagement is an ideal way to boost your knowledge about crypto in a technical aspect, however, upon investing, you'll be safe if you intend to hold your crypto assets for a long-term purpose. So good luck!

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on September 18, 2023, 07:22:21 PMCan you impact us how to eliminate this spirit of fear in crypto investment by sharing your idea or experience because, I'm ready to learn crypto so that I will be bold in any season I will come across in the future.Regardless of the level of knowledge you have gained in cryptocurrency investment, there is always the feeling of uncertainty when you want to invest. But you still put in your money because you believe that you will gain something from your investment. I have spent just a few years in the Bitcoin environment and have learned some ways of defeating the fear of investing in Bitcoin.  One of my strategies is to keep learning every day. I ensure that I gather basic knowledge of the past and recent developments in the Bitcoin space. Reading about the past will enable one to understand how Bitcoin works and knowing about the latest developments is important in making investment decisions. Knowledge is a potent instrument to fight FUD triggered by lies from the media. Secondly to limit my fears and worries I don't invest more than I can afford to lose or bear. Acknowledging that the sector has it's level of risk has made to invest only funds I can survive without. There is no need to be greedy which can spur one to borrow or sell valuable assets to invest in Bitcoin just to make a huge profit. I have learned to be content and invest only what I can comfortably afford.

comments.author: reagansimms
comments.body: Ignore all the negative views of the government and its minions on crypto assets, they are never happy with the presence of crypto because they consider it a threat to the continuity of their business. Decentralized Cryptocurrency cannot be controlled, making governments unable to fully accept crypto assets developing in their countries. The presence of Cryptocurrency has changed people's view of banks, bank customers are starting to turn to crypto because it offers all the advantages they don't find in banks.There will always be people who want to learn Cryptocurrency after knowing all the advantages and convenience when making transactions, they will try to use their free time to read all the information that can increase their insight into crypto. Don't ever get bored of learning Bitcoin, you will get great benefits when you already know how to increase your income from Bitcoin.

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: What goes up must come down and what comes down also have it's surging days, this is how crypto works, avoid the negativity that many people are saying about crypto and develop your crypto foundation with knowledge and hope, you need to understand the market sentiment and oy invest what you can afford to lose, yes crypto can turn a poor man into a rich man but it's still risky, that's why you need to invest only what you can afford to lose. Many crypto investors are not real investors, they have fear in them and that's why bear market looks like a never ending situation for all, but it's a matter of time and dedication, this tough time will also pass. Learn how to make money off bear and bull markets, The majority of people lose money in the bull market and even the bear market, that's because they don't understand how the crypto cycle works, The Bear market is where you keep your mind out of fear and make decisions, people will run from the market to avoid losing money, but it's the best time for the brave to accumulate and wait. The Bull market is where you want to start reaping your hard work in the bear market, avoid greediness and start taking profits, leave others out of it, and let them make their own decisions.

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: Beginners are not ready to see price changes that occur constantly, so they worry too much and end up investing their money in inappropriate coins.But if they only own bitcoins and focus on accumulating bitcoins, their choice will be right and will provide profits in the bull market later.You don't need to be afraid of market changes as long as your focus is only on collecting bitcoins and buying bitcoins using DCA.But if you want to trade, you must learn more about trading analysis to know market entries and exits.In this case, beginners need to be more patient and calm so that they are not influenced by what other people do and can still decide to buy more bitcoins.During a bear market like this, you get the opportunity to buy lots of coins that have the potential to increase but still focus on collecting bitcoin as the main investment.

comments.body: Every newbie wants the price of Bitcoin to always accelerate higher and not downward but as long as you are planning to join any investment, you should be very ready for anything that will happen next whether it is good or bad.I have only witnessed a few newbies who are so scared about Bitcoin price, mostly when the price is dropping from high to low they just rush to sell their coins and never wait for the next outcome, whether the price will go up again and that is not the way it should be.Anybody who sells he's or her coins because of fear in price drop, that means the investor is not ready for investment, that is why every newbie must learn about Bitcoin before they join so that they can be able to face anything that they come across from the investment.
